## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-threadsanitizer-cpp-/threadsanitizer">ThreadSanitizer</a>: instrument the code in module to find races.

Instantiating <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-threadsanitizer-cpp-/threadsanitizer">ThreadSanitizer</a> inserts the tsan runtime library API function declarations into the module if they don&#39;t exist already. Instantiating ensures the &#95;&#95;tsan&#95;init function is in the list of global constructors for the module.

Definition at line 107 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/threadsanitizer-cpp">ThreadSanitizer.cpp</a>.
